relation: Great for these types of students
Campus is safe and everyone interacts like family
I don't know much about the Greek life.
Great for quit and athletic students who just want to sit and study.
There are many stores and restaurants around and even a movie theatre close by.
The food isn't the best thing about the school but is just alright
Life in the dorm is fantastic but the dorm rooms are extremely small

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students try to get as much general education credits finished really soon so you aren't scrambling to get them done during your senior year. this is really important. In three sentences cardinal stritch university is a private college that has a nice atmosphere and great teachers. the class sizes are small and the teachers really care if you are doing well in classes.
